channel.title: How to add shops to WinterLove?
channel.description: Thanks for all the help, but everytime I try to make a shop, it wont work.

item.title: How to add shops to WinterLove?
item.dc:creator: @Blake4052 Blake4052
item.description:
@Blake4052 wrote:

:eek: I added an NPC I could attack and I can’t kill it! >.< Is there a guide for this anywhere? lolz I hate to keep asking.

Edit: no there is no NPC, Winterlove is completely wiped clean… :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 01:37:03 pm[/size][hr]Um, I found

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";

Read full topic
item.source: How to add shops to WinterLove?

item.title: How to add shops to WinterLove?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Do you see any NPC’s where you start? Do they say anything?

If they do, then search EXACTLY or just part of what they say in NPCHandler.java

You could also try searching for:

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";

You probably won’t find that, since every server is different. Other then that i wont be able to guide you on where it is, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add shops to WinterLove?
item.dc:creator: @Blake4052 Blake4052
item.description:
@Blake4052 wrote:

I can’t find “welcome to Winterlove”… So I dont know where to put that code…

Read full topic
item.source: How to add shops to WinterLove?

item.title: How to add shops to WinterLove?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Right click NPCHandler.java and choose “Edit”.

If it doesn’t open and it says like… “Select a program from the internet” or something, just choose “Select a program” and find notepad.

Once your in NPCHandler.java press CTRL + F and try searching for a text that an NPC says in your server… Most likely you’ll be able to find like

“Welcome to Winterlove” or something like that.

At the last “}” You find Press enter and put this code

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YourTEXT"; } }

Now just edit “NPCID” With the NPC that you want, and “YourTEXT” with what you want it to say ( You need those quotes around the text by the way )

Hope that helps, once your done compile and run your server.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add shops to WinterLove?

item.title: How to add shops to WinterLove?
item.dc:creator: @Blake4052 Blake4052
item.description:
@Blake4052 wrote:

[quote=“Xile Maizez, post:2, topic:247770”]Well… What happens?

Make sure you have the right codes in the right places…

shops.cfg = Where you add the shop and the npc ID for that shop.

NPCHandler.java = Dialouge of the npc you want

autospawn.cfg = Where you add the npc’s X and Y coordinates of where you want it to spawn.

Hopefully you have the codes for all of these. If you dont just try using one of the codes that are already there, and just edit it.[/quote]

Yeah, how do I edit the NPCHandler.java ? and the npc ID is just like a shopekeeper? t?

Read full topic

item.title: How to add shops to WinterLove?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Well… What happens?

Make sure you have the right codes in the right places…

shops.cfg = Where you add the shop and the npc ID for that shop.

NPCHandler.java = Dialouge of the npc you want

autospawn.cfg = Where you add the npc’s X and Y coordinates of where you want it to spawn.

Hopefully you have the codes for all of these. If you dont just try using one of the codes that are already there, and just edit it.
